body:
Day 14 - Manga 319*
The art was too basic and the story all over the place, at first it was about the lady with shit luck but then it kept changing protagonist and I fucking hate multi story books. 2/10.
Also, just accept bro. I've already sent it.
Also, Mina, if you want my discord is bulba2020t#1548, I know you probably won't, but reach out, kinda want someone to discuss this type of thing with
